paper.title: Decidability of a temporal logic problem for petri nets

author.org: Mining Institute of the Czechoslovak Academy of Sciences, A. Římana 1768, 708 00 Ostrava 4, Czechoslovakia

paper.venue: Symposium on Theoretical Aspects of Computer Science
paper.abstract: Abstract The paper solves an open problem from [4] by showing a decision algorithm for a temporal logic language L ( Q ′, GF). It implies the decidability of the problem of the existence of an infinite weakly fair occurence sequence for a given Petri net; thereby an open problem from [2] is solved.
